name: CodeElement
desc: Represents a single element or fragment of code within a CodeStructure.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CodeStructure
desc: Represents the hierarchical structure of a source code file.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getElements
desc: Returns the list of CodeElement objects representing the code hierarchy.

name: getType
desc: Returns the type of the code (e.g., 'HTML', 'JS', 'CSS').

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CodeStructureBuilder
desc: Builder for constructing a CodeStructure using a fluent API.

name: CodeStructureBuilder.new
desc: Creates a new CodeStructureBuilder instance.

name: addElement
desc: Adds a single element to the code structure.

name: addElements
desc: Adds multiple elements to the code structure.

name: build
desc: Builds the CodeStructure using the accumulated elements and type.

name: withType
desc: Sets the code type (e.g., 'HTML', 'JS', 'CSS') for the structure.

name: ConditionalStatement
desc: Represents a conditional (if) statement in a template or code structure.

name: ConditionalStatement.new
desc:
Creates a new ConditionalStatement with the given condition, statement,
line, content, and optional children.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getStatement
desc: Returns the core statement content.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.

name: ConfigurableJtl
desc:
An extension of Jtl that provides full runtime configurability for
the JetLeaf template engine, allowing developers to customize or replace
all core components that affect template rendering.

name: setAssetBuilder
desc: Replaces the AssetBuilder used to locate or load template content.

name: setExpressionEvaluator
desc: Replaces the TemplateExpressionEvaluator used by the template engine.

name: setFilterRegistry
desc: Replaces the TemplateFilterRegistry used for variable filters in templates.

name: setTemplateCache
desc: Replaces the TemplateCache used for storing and retrieving rendered templates.

name: setTemplateRenderer
desc: Replaces the TemplateRenderer used to render templates into SourceCode.

name: setVariableResolver
desc: Replaces the TemplateVariableResolver used by the template engine.

name: DefaultCodeStructure
desc:
Default implementation of CodeStructure, representing a hierarchical
structure of code elements within a template or source file.

name: DefaultCodeStructure.new
desc: Creates a new DefaultCodeStructure with the given elements and type.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getElements
desc: Returns the list of CodeElement objects representing the code hierarchy.

name: getType
desc: Returns the type of the code (e.g., 'HTML', 'JS', 'CSS').

name: DefaultExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Default implementation of TemplateExpressionEvaluator, capable of
evaluating template expressions in a given TemplateContext.

name: DefaultExpressionEvaluator.new
desc:
Default implementation of TemplateExpressionEvaluator, capable of
evaluating template expressions in a given TemplateContext.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the given expression string using the provided context.

name: DefaultSourceCode
desc:
Represents the concrete implementation of SourceCode, encapsulating
an asset, its code structure, raw content, and rendered content.

name: DefaultSourceCode.new
desc:
Creates a new DefaultSourceCode instance with the given _asset,
_codeStructure, _renderedContent, and _rawContent.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAsset
desc: Returns the Asset associated with this source code.

name: getCodeStructure
desc: Returns the structured representation of the code.

name: getRawContent
desc: Returns the raw/unprocessed template content.

name: getRenderedContent
desc: Returns the fully rendered content as a string.

name: DefaultTemplateContext
desc:
Default implementation of TemplateContext, representing the context
in which a template is rendered.

name: DefaultTemplateContext.new
desc: Creates a new DefaultTemplateContext with the given attributes.

name: getExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Returns a TemplateExpressionEvaluator capable of evaluating
expressions within the template context.

name: getVariableResolver
desc:
Returns a TemplateVariableResolver capable of resolving template
variable names into their string representations.

name: DefaultTemplateRenderer
desc:
A template renderer that converts Template instances into
fully-rendered source code strings (SourceCode) using context-aware
processing, variable substitution, conditionals, loops, and filters.

name: DefaultTemplateRenderer.new
desc:
A template renderer that converts Template instances into
fully-rendered source code strings (SourceCode) using context-aware
processing, variable substitution, conditionals, loops, and filters.

name: render
desc: Renders the given template using its associated TemplateContext.

name: DefaultVariableResolver
desc:
Default implementation of TemplateVariableResolver, providing variable
resolution from a flat or nested map of values.

name: DefaultVariableResolver.new
desc: Creates a new DefaultVariableResolver with the given variable map.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves the given variable name to its string representation.

name: setVariables
desc: Sets multiple variables at once.

name: ForEachStatement
desc: Represents a loop statement (each block) within a template or code structure.

name: ForEachStatement.new
desc:
Creates a new ForEachStatement with the given itemsKey, statement,
line, content, and optional children.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getItemsKey
desc: Returns the key of the collection being iterated.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getStatement
desc: Returns the core statement content.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.

name: HtmlTagElement
desc:
Represents an HTML tag element within a CodeStructure, including
optional opening and closing tags, content, and nested child elements.

name: HtmlTagElement.new
desc:
Creates a new HtmlTagElement with the given tagName, line, content,
optional openingTag, closingTag, and optional children.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.

name: InMemoryTemplateCache
desc:
An in-memory implementation of TemplateCache that stores rendered
templates in a simple Map<String, SourceCode>.

name: InMemoryTemplateCache.new
desc:
An in-memory implementation of TemplateCache that stores rendered
templates in a simple Map<String, SourceCode>.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a cached SourceCode object for a given template.

name: invalidateCache
desc: Clears all cached templates from the cache.

name: put
desc: Stores a rendered SourceCode object in the cache for a given template.

name: remove
desc: Removes a cached SourceCode object for a given template.

name: IncludeStatement
desc:
Represents an include statement in a template, which imports or
embeds another template within the current template.

name: IncludeStatement.new
desc: Creates a new IncludeStatement with the given templateName, statement, and line.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getStatement
desc: Returns the core statement content.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.

name: getTemplateName
desc: Returns the name of the included template.

name: Jtl
desc:
The core JetLeaf template engine interface, providing access to
template rendering, caching, variable resolution, expression evaluation,
filters, and asset sourcing.

name: getAssetBuilder
desc: Returns the AssetBuilder used to locate or load template content.

name: getCache
desc: Returns the TemplateCache used for storing and retrieving rendered templates.

name: getExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Returns the TemplateExpressionEvaluator for evaluating expressions
within templates.

name: getFilterRegistry
desc: Returns the TemplateFilterRegistry used to manage filters for template variables.

name: getRenderer
desc: Returns the TemplateRenderer responsible for rendering templates.

name: getVariableResolver
desc:
Returns the TemplateVariableResolver for resolving template variables
to their runtime string representations.

name: render
desc: Renders the given template into a SourceCode object.

name: JtlFactory
desc:
A concrete, fully configurable factory for the JetLeaf template engine,
implementing ConfigurableJtl and providing a complete, ready-to-use
template engine instance.

name: JtlFactory.new
desc:
A concrete, fully configurable factory for the JetLeaf template engine,
implementing ConfigurableJtl and providing a complete, ready-to-use
template engine instance.

name: getAssetBuilder
desc: Returns the AssetBuilder used to locate or load template content.

name: getCache
desc: Returns the TemplateCache used for storing and retrieving rendered templates.

name: getExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Returns the TemplateExpressionEvaluator for evaluating expressions
within templates.

name: getFilterRegistry
desc: Returns the TemplateFilterRegistry used to manage filters for template variables.

name: getRenderer
desc: Returns the TemplateRenderer responsible for rendering templates.

name: getVariableResolver
desc:
Returns the TemplateVariableResolver for resolving template variables
to their runtime string representations.

name: render
desc: Renders the given template into a SourceCode object.

name: setAssetBuilder
desc: Replaces the AssetBuilder used to locate or load template content.

name: setExpressionEvaluator
desc: Replaces the TemplateExpressionEvaluator used by the template engine.

name: setFilterRegistry
desc: Replaces the TemplateFilterRegistry used for variable filters in templates.

name: setTemplateCache
desc: Replaces the TemplateCache used for storing and retrieving rendered templates.

name: setTemplateRenderer
desc: Replaces the TemplateRenderer used to render templates into SourceCode.

name: setVariableResolver
desc: Replaces the TemplateVariableResolver used by the template engine.

name: JtlTemplate
desc:
A concrete implementation of Template that stores a template source
and a map of attributes to inject during rendering.

name: JtlTemplate.new
desc: Creates a new JtlTemplate with the given template content and attributes.

name: getAttributes
desc: Returns a map of dynamic attributes to inject into the template.

name: getLocation
desc: Returns the path or location of the template as a string.

name: SourceCode
desc: Represents the output of a template rendering or code generation process.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAsset
desc: Returns the Asset associated with this source code.

name: getCodeStructure
desc: Returns the structured representation of the code.

name: getRawContent
desc: Returns the raw/unprocessed template content.

name: getRenderedContent
desc: Returns the fully rendered content as a string.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: SourceCodeBuilder
desc: Builder for constructing a SourceCode instance using a fluent API.

name: SourceCodeBuilder.new
desc: Builder for constructing a SourceCode instance using a fluent API.

name: build
desc: Builds the SourceCode instance.

name: withAsset
desc: Sets the asset for this source code.

name: withCodeStructure
desc: Sets the code structure.

name: withRawContent
desc: Sets the raw template content before rendering.

name: withRenderedContent
desc: Sets the rendered content after template evaluation.

name: Statement
desc: Represents a code statement within a CodeStructure or template.

name: getStatement
desc: Returns the core statement content.

name: Template
desc:
Represents an abstract template source that can be rendered by a
TemplateRenderer using a set of dynamic attributes or a
TemplateContext.

name: getAttributes
desc: Returns a map of dynamic attributes to inject into the template.

name: getLocation
desc: Returns the path or location of the template as a string.

name: TemplateCache
desc:
An interface for caching rendered templates to improve performance
and reduce repeated parsing/rendering of template content.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a cached SourceCode object for a given template.

name: invalidateCache
desc: Clears all cached templates from the cache.

name: put
desc: Stores a rendered SourceCode object in the cache for a given template.

name: remove
desc: Removes a cached SourceCode object for a given template.

name: TemplateContext
desc:
Represents the runtime context for a template, providing the mechanisms
to resolve variables and evaluate expressions during template rendering.

name: getExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Returns a TemplateExpressionEvaluator capable of evaluating
expressions within the template context.

name: getVariableResolver
desc:
Returns a TemplateVariableResolver capable of resolving template
variable names into their string representations.

name: TemplateExpressionEvaluator
desc:
Evaluates expressions in the context of a template, returning a
boolean result that indicates whether the expression is truthy.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the given expression string using the provided context.

name: TemplateFilter
desc: Represents a filter function that transforms a value in a template.

name: TemplateFilterRegistry
desc:
Registry for template filters that transform or process values during
template rendering.

name: TemplateFilterRegistry.new
desc: Creates a new TemplateFilterRegistry and registers all built-in filters.

name: getFilter
desc: Retrieves a filter by its name.

name: registerFilter
desc: Registers a custom filter with the given name and filter function.

name: TemplateRenderer
desc:
An interface for rendering templates into fully-formed SourceCode
using a given TemplateContext.

name: render
desc: Renders the given template using its associated TemplateContext.

name: TemplateVariableResolver
desc:
Resolves template variable names into their string representations
at runtime during template rendering.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves the given variable name to its string representation.

name: setVariables
desc: Sets multiple variables at once.

name: TextCodeElement
desc: Represents a plain text element within a CodeStructure.

name: TextCodeElement.new
desc:
Creates a new TextCodeElement with the given line, content, and
optional children.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getChildren
desc: Returns the list of child elements contained within this element.

name: getClosingTag
desc: Returns the closing tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getContent
desc: Returns the content of this element, excluding/including tags.

name: getLine
desc: Returns the raw line of code corresponding to this element.

name: getOpeningTag
desc: Returns the opening tag of this element, if applicable.

name: getTagName
desc: Returns the name of the tag or element, if applicable.
